amendment.description: To provide for a strategy for the Department of Defense for the management of the electromagnetic spectrum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 797 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 797 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S6838-6839; text: CR S6838-6839) To provide for a strategy for the Department of Defense for the management of the electromagnetic spectrum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 797 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 797 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lieberman.
